alert.note: Alert for Carter; Fallon (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 14 at 7:25PM MST until February 14 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Periods of snow continuing. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. Winds gusting to 30 mph, reducing visibility in blowing snow. * WHERE...Carter and Fallon. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday evening commute.
info.instruction: Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
